name: LOW Associates Brussels
goal:
LOWeurope is a strategic communications consultancy with offices in the UK & Brussels and a network of Associates across Europe.
We specialise in creating policy-rich events; managing complex programmes; PR and all types of marketing communications; and EU related public affairs.
We create and research strategies to get our clients' message across and boost their reputation.
We create events that get decision makers, opinion formers, customers and staff thinking.
We help the public sector talk to & influence the private sector more effectively -and vice versa.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
The Small Business Act
The Circular Economy
Energy efficiency
COSME
Horizon 2020
Public health and food safety
Digital technology
